name: FarmPi
description:
Instructions:

You have recently been baked by Delores the baker. Because she created you with extra “love” you gained sentience. To show your appreciation, you started a pie farm to help grow Delores’ business.

Select the hoe (1) and use the interact button (SPACE) to prepare the ground for planting. Select the seeds (2) and use the interact button to plant. Water your seeds with the watering can (3) every day and in two days your pies will be ready to harvest! Interact with Delores to exchange your pies for more pie seeds. To move to the next day, interact with the oven.

Controls:

W - Move character up

S - Move character down

A - Move character left

D - Move character right

1 - Select hoe

2 - Select seeds

3 - Select watering can

SPACE - Interact

Credits:

Created by Phillip Bryan and Cecily Mobley

Background music - Frozen Langos by Ozzed
